channel.title: Connecting 2 VPS' together
channel.description:
[size=30pt][font=Tahoma]I have 3 VPS'
I'm thinking of having one VPS hosting a 508 server, Then my other VPS hosting my 317 server,
So its like high and low detail,
Is it possible to connect them together so its like world 1 low detail and world 2 high detail
Also where they can chat on Private chat etc,
?[/font][/size]

item.title: Connecting 2 VPS' together
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

1.) Stop using massive text, it’s fucking annoying.
2.) If you know how Dodian did it, you don’t need our help?
3.) If you can’t even do that, don’t try running 2 servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting 2 VPS' together
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

[size=40pt][font=Tahoma]Na i’ve seen it before… Dodian did it,

They had v3.0 & v4.0

v3.0 was the 317
v4.0 was 503+ and they were connected.javascript:void(0);

:[[/font][/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting 2 VPS' together
item.dc:creator: @Sir-HeadShot Sir-HeadShot
item.description:
@Sir-HeadShot wrote:

Uhh If Ur Talking like In Real RS Where theres worlds.And u wanna use 2 worlds with diffrent client versions.thats almost impossible without a double version client witch ive never seen.And u can connect a vps together but making 2 diffrent server versions connect to 1 client is nearly impossible. but as they say nothings impossible.

Read full topic
